title: iPhone Automation Expert for Mac-Controlled iOS Automation
job_overview:
Description:
We seeking an experienced iOS automation professional to help set up and manage iPhone automation processes controlled via my Mac. The main task will involve setting up and automating account creation workflows for various apps through iOS using automation tools.

Key Requirements:
 • Expertise in Appium / Selenium and other iOS automation frameworks/tools.
 • Familiarity with Mac-to-iPhone automation setups.
 • Strong understanding of iOS configurations, workflows, and device management.
 • Ability to demonstrate previous relevant work in iOS automation.
 • Knowledge of scripting languages (e.g., Python, JavaScript, Swift) for automation tasks.

Responsibilities:
 • Set up robust and efficient iOS automation workflows.
 • Test and troubleshoot automation scripts to ensure flawless operation.
 • Collaborate to understand the desired outcomes and optimize the automation process.
 • Provide documentation or guidance for future maintenance.

Preferred Skills (Optional):
 • Experience with iOS device provisioning profiles and certificates.
 • Familiarity with automating tasks involving third-party apps.

Please apply only if you have demonstrable experience with iOS automation (preferably with Appium) and can provide examples of your past work.

We are a U.S. based marketing company and offer competitive wages.
